Rulings.Edison:
●Destroying the Special Summoned monster when it is changed to Defense Position, or when Limit Reverse is removed from the field, does not start a Chain.
●If the Special Summoned monster is flipped face-down, Limit Reverse's effect disappears.
Rulings.Tengu:
●Destroying the Special Summoned monster when it is changed to Defense Position, or when Limit Reverse is removed from the field, does not start a Chain.
●If the Special Summoned monster is flipped face-down, Limit Reverse's effect disappears.

Rulings.Cat:
● Destroying the Special Summoned monster when it is changed to Defense Position, or when 'Limit Reverse' leaves the field, does not start a Chain.
● If the Special Summoned monster is flipped face-down, 'Limit Reverse's' effect disappears.

Rulings.Base: 1. Destroying the Special Summoned monster when it is changed to Defense Position, or when "Limit Reverse" is removed from the field, does not start a Chain.\n2. If the Special Summoned monster is flipped face-down, the effect of "Limit Reverse" disappears.
